newsitem.title: USA: Access Health says merger to be accretive.
newsitem.headline: Access Health says merger to be accretive.

text.p: Access Health Inc said on Thursday its proposed merger with Informed Access Systems will be accretive to earnings in 1997.
The personal health services company said that after the acquisition, which is slated to close by the end of the month, it will have 16 million members.

The company also said that the Blue Cross Blue Shield Association told the company last week it will start using its services on a trial basis in certain locations beginning in 1997. Access Health said that depending on the results of the trial program it may be extended to all 3.6 million members enrolled in the Federal Employees Program.
Earlier, the company reported fourth quarter profits of $2.5 million or $0.18 a share compared with $1.0 million or $0.10 a share in the year-ago period.
